message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Given its unique features and capabilities, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $18000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure this high-quality item at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to hearing your response.
